_header: I stand as still as any stone

YaleBei365.Transcription:
I stond as styll as ony stounThe grace of god þan he wyll
                    sendAll thyng may not cum a nonBut wane god wyll yt may a
                    mend
YaleBei365.Editions:
Smith,  Lucy Toulmin,
                        ed.  
             A Commonplace Book of the Fifteenth Century.
         Norwich: Kerrison, Goose, 1886: 20.
Chambers,  Edmund Kerchever,  and  Frank Sidgwick.  
             Early English Lyrics….
         London: Buller, 1907, 1911 et seq: 161.
